net.semanticmetadata.lire.searchers

Class BitSamplingImageSearcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.semanticmetadata.lire.searchers.AbstractImageSearcher
      • net.semanticmetadata.lire.searchers.BitSamplingImageSearcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageSearcher

    public class BitSamplingImageSearcher
extends AbstractImageSearcher
    This class allows for searching based on BitSampling HashingMode. First a number of candidates is retrieved from the index, then the candidates are re-ranked. The number of candidates can be tuned with the numHashedResults parameter in the constructor. The higher this parameter, the better the results, but the slower the search.
    Author:
    Mathias Lux, mathias@juggle.at, 2013-04-12

        Creates a new searcher for BitSampling based hashes.
        Parameters:
        maximumHits - how many hits the searcher shall return.
        featureFieldName - the field hashFunctionsFileName of the feature.
        hashesFieldName - the field hashFunctionsFileName of the hashes.
        feature - an instance of the feature.

        Parameters:
        maximumHits - how many hits the searcher shall return.
        feature - an instance of the feature.
        useFastSearch - if true it only uses a random sample of hashes for the query and speeds up the search significantly.
